name: AIRROBO Dog Grooming Vacuum Kit,12000Pa Strong Pet Vacuum for Shedding,Grooming Hai,Quiet,PG100,2L Large Capacity
short_description: DOG GROOMING VACUUM with 12000PA STRONG SUCTION POWER- with a strong suction power of up to 12000pa, our dog grooming kit with vacuum function can suck up to 99% of pet hair into the dust box as you groom, preventing pet hair from spreading and creating a mess. Say goodbye to hair-covered furniture and hello to a tidy, fur-free home.

LOW NOISE DESIGN & 3 ADJUSTABLE SUCTION LEVELS- Your pet will enjoy the dog hair vacuum. the lowest noise level is below 50dB, quieter than the vacuum cleaner, it won't scare your pet. it has 3 adjustable suction levels, and you can adjust it as per the comfort and size of your dog.

MULTIPLE GUIDIE COMES - 6 different-sized guide combs(3mm & 6mm & 9mm & 12mm &18mm & 24mm) can be used to trim pet hair of different lengths. This allows you to achieve the perfect look for your pet, regardless of their hair length.

LARGE CAPACITY DUST CUP-Our dog grooming vacuum for shedding comes with a large dust cup, which is large enough for even large dogs, there is no need to stop and empty it frequently while grooming and trimming, and the dust cup is so easy to empty- just pull the quick-release snap on the dust cup for touch-free emptying.

EXPERIENCE PROFESSIONAL-QUALITY GROOMING EXPERIENCE at Home- Our 5-in-1 Pet Grooming Kit and vacuum has everything you need to groom dogs and cats and can give your pet a professional-quality grooming experience right in the comfort of your own home whether you have a long-haired or short-haired pet! Save you time and money on expensive trips to the groomer!

4.9FT DETACAHLE HOSE - 4.9FT(1.5m) extended hose can give you more flexibility to clean hard-to-reach areas and allow you to keep your pets far away from the motor noise, making it more suitable for sensitive or large pets. and the detachable design allows you to remove and replace it.
